name: Puzzle Rocks
synopsis: Take your time to find the best strategy, improve your moves, and make as many matches as possible during a single turn to improve your score. Question #1: How to keep your brain active? Answer: Play Puzzle Rocks! Stop the falling stones! Question #2: Do you have what it takes to get through 36 various levels? Answer: We will see. Features: - 36 different levels in four chapters, combining six different shapes with six colors in a brain-teaser - Match-3 style puzzle game on the touch screen - Switch match-3 and shape-match minigame anytime - Normal and time limit mode - Combos with explosive lighting and sound effects - Many hours of entertainment - Record of best scores for each level - Collect bronze, silver, and gold medal for each level
